snippet.title: Inspector Waffles Early Days - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspector Waffles Early Days is Inspector Waffles' prequel. 

A top-down detective adventure with point-and-click mechanics, inspired by classic Game Boy games. Follow Waffles in his first days as an inspector who wants to prove to everyone that he is more than just a rookie. But beware… Your future worst enemy is hiding in the shadows.

Coming soon on Steam, GOG and... Game Boy Color!

Steam: http://www.inspectorwaffles.com
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/inspector_wa...
